name: Hostile Takeover (The Quiet Men)
description:
In a world where super heroes are common place, society is structured so the strong rule the weak. So accepted is this rule, that simply beating someone in combat will grant you their job, property and position! So only the strongest rule at the top of the biggest companies. The story follows Barbara Kho, an office secretary with no powers, whose weakness has lead to a life of hardship and harassment. But an unfortunate incident changes her life forever! And gives her the strength needed to rule corporate America.

Learn how Kho becomes the Executive Cobra and how she learns to tackle her foes with ego and weapons. The stronger the foe, the stronger the weapon.

Special move

Business Trip

Controls

Space- jump

Alt- shoot

Tested with keyboard and mouse.

Controller compatibility may very.

Special thanks to

https://Postermywall.com and Bossku for the magazine font.

https://www.aiva.ai/ for the music

*latest version fixes bug that skipped some dialogue and story scenes and broke the game's sound.

Also to fix a couple game breaking glitches. Nothing major, however, it might be impossible to beat certain bosses in the older versions.

Please download the newest version.
